Package details

Source: R/info-cran.R
get_pkg_details.Rd

Extracts package details from crandb API.

get_pkg_details(package_name)

Arguments

package_name

Name of the R package.

Examples

get_pkg_details("dplyr")
#> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8.
#> $Type
#> [1] "Package"
#> 
#> $Package
#> [1] "dplyr"
#> 
#> $Title
#> [1] "A Grammar of Data Manipulation"
#> 
#> $Version
#> [1] "0.8.2"
#> 
#> $`Authors@R`
#> [1] "c(\nperson(\"Hadley\", \"Wickham\", , \"hadley@rstudio.com\", c(\"aut\", \"cre\"), comment = c(ORCID = \"0000-0003-4757-117X\")),\nperson(\"Romain\", \"Fran\\u00e7ois\", role = \"aut\", comment = c(ORCID = \"0000-0002-2444-4226\")),\nperson(\"Lionel\", \"Henry\", role = \"aut\"),\nperson(\"Kirill\", \"M\\u00fcller\", role = \"aut\", comment = c(ORCID = \"0000-0002-1416-3412\")),\nperson(\"RStudio\", role = c(\"cph\", \"fnd\"))\n)"
